metadata.title: Replacement Remote Control for Orion VR313, VR0212, VHSA6687CTBEA, VR213, VP0040
features: Redi-Remotes cannot be programmed to control any auxillary devices. They will do every function for the specific unit they are designed to control.
Redi-Remotes are not equipped with laser pointers or LED lights.
description: This is a custom built replacement remote made by Redi Remote for the ORION remote control number 076N0EA010. *This is NOT an original remote control. It is a custom replacement remote made by Redi-Remote* This remote control is specifically designed to be compatible with the following models of ORION units: VR313, VR0212, VHSA6687CTBEA, VR213, VP0040, VHSA6687CTBE, VCR2511, VR313A, VCR2510C, VR0212A, 076N0EA010, VR0211C, JVHS3987D *If you have any concerns with the remote after purchase, please contact me directly* There is a cover over the lower half of the remote. This will slide down to reveal the lower half buttons.
